trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 비주얼 디자이너에서 디자인 타임 지원을 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"> </xref> 웹 서버 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control renders a button that automatically checks the authentication status of the user and displays the appropriate login or logout option.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>컨트롤이 자동으로 사용자의 인증 상태를 확인 하 고 적절 한 로그인 또는 로그 아웃 옵션을 표시 하는 단추를 렌더링 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 비주얼 디자이너에서 소스 뷰에서 디자인 뷰로 전환 하면 태그 소스 코드 설명 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>제어 구문 분석 되 고 디자인 화면에 컨트롤의 디자인 타임 버전이 만들어집니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 소스 뷰로 다시 전환 하는 경우 디자인 타임 컨트롤 태그 소스 코드에 유지 되 고 웹 페이지에 대 한 태그를 편집 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The LoginStatusDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: LoginStatusDesigner 클래스에 대 한 디자인 타임 지원을 제공는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A>속성 반환 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>개체에서 파생 된 개체는 일반적으로 포함 하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>디자이너의 클래스는 상속 트리에서 각 수준에 대 한.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> to generate the design-time markup, since the user authentication status is not available at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>속성은 항상 반환 `true`, 디자이너에 연결 된 임시 복사본을 만들어 있는지 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>디자인 타임에는 사용자 인증 상태를 사용할 수 없기 때문에 디자인 타임 태그를 생성 하려면.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>메서드는 연결 된 렌더링 하는 데 사용 되는 태그를 반환 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>디자인 타임에.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A>메서드는 디자이너를 표시, 편집 및 디자인 관련된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> 준비</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 내부적으로 생성 하는.NET Framework는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner>연결 된 만들 때 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>컨트롤 또는 디자인 화면에서 해당 컨트롤의 복사본입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: 이 디자이너의 디자이너 작업 목록 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> class, adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is obtained from the ActionLists base property, and then returns the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: ActionLists 속성 만듭니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>개체에 대 한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner>클래스에 추가 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>ActionLists 기준 속성에서 가져온 하 고 다음을 반환 하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>컬렉션.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> 이 디자이너와 연결 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임에 연결된 된 컨트롤을 렌더링 하는 데 사용 되는 태그를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> property (depending on whether the user is logged in), is `null`, an empty string (""), or a single space (" "), the GetDesignTimeHtml method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> property, as appropriate, to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property, enclosed in brackets ("[ ]").
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A>(로그인 여부에 따라 사용자가), 속성은 `null`, 빈 문자열 (""), 또는 단일 공백 (""), GetDesignTimeHtml 메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A>속성을 적절 하 게는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>괄호 ("")로 묶인 속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, regardless of the setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>, the GetDesignTimeHtml method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> base method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: 설정에 관계 없이 다음의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>, GetDesignTimeHtml 메서드 호출의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>기본의 디자인 타임 렌더링에 대 한 태그를 생성 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: 렌더링 하는 데 사용 되는 태그를 포함 하는 문자열은 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"> </xref> 디자인 타임에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너를 표시, 편집 및 연결된 된 컨트롤을 디자인을 준비 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The visual designer calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너를 사용 하 여 렌더링할 준비가 되었을 때 Initialize 메서드에서 호출 하는 비주얼 디자이너는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 초기화 및 기본 메서드 속성을 구성 하 고는 디자이너의 작업에 필요한 이벤트를 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: `component` 매개 변수는는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>의 복사본 또는이 디자이너와 연결 된 컨트롤에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"></xref>, which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"> </xref>를 구현 하는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너의 디자인 타임 태그를 생성 하는 디자이너와 연결 된 실제 컨트롤이 아닌 임시 복사본을 사용 해야 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Because the UsePreviewControl property is always `true`, the designer <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: UsePreviewControl 속성은 항상 있으므로 `true`, 디자이너 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>관련 된 복사본을 반환 하는 속성 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>컨트롤을 디자인 타임 태그를 생성 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property creates the copy by persisting the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control, then parsing the persisted control string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>속성은 실제 여는 복사본을 만듭니다 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>컨트롤을 지속형된 제어 문자열을 구문 분석 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The copied control does not affect any persistence for the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.
trans-unit.target: 복사 된 컨트롤에 유지 하는 실제 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> 에 대 한 영향을 주지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.
trans-unit.target: UsePreviewControl 속성은 반환 하도록 재정의 하는 경우 `false`는 디자이너에서 연결 된 사용 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>자체는 디자인 타임 태그 및 컨트롤에 디자인 타임 변경 작업을 생성 하는 페이지 태그 소스에 유지 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
